Its a Absolutly Phenomenal game, great gameplay, great story and excellent humour! It can be more than just recommended, likely a must too because its way beyond great and prefect execution. But its also recommended to play first Portal 1 then 2 since in Portal 2 the difficulty gets raised pretty early and Portal 1 is very good to get used to the Portal gun and the first mechanics, get deeper into the story and of course learn from it!

Simplesmente perfeito, inúmeras coisas melhoradas do primeiro jogo, desde gráficos, controle sobre o personagem, a própria mecânica de portais e muito mais. Adorei a história e altamente recomendo jogar o mesmo se gostar de uma narrativa engraçada e com quebra-cabeças muito bem variados e difíceis. Me agrada que o jogo seja longo na medida certa, é ótimo para não devorar todo o conteúdo numa jogatina só, assim como o primeiro jogo fazia. Jogue!

Ah Portal 2. As if the first game wasn't enough they made a sequel and somehow improved! I've had a blast playing this and the coop. I even dabbled in the custom map making, though I was severely limited by my creativity (or lack thereof). It's an amazing game even to this day and is a must play for anyone who can spare the £7.19 required to play this masterpiece of creation.

Portal 2 is an amazing and fun puzzle game with a great story and allot of repeatability. With the addition of steam workshop being compatible with this game, playing others levels make the game more fun with more things to do as well as the modding community is great at adding more to this game. the test chamber creator is also a really nice addition to the already wonderful game giving you access to relax and also challenge your friends or foes to see who can make the hardest chamber or just relax and make whatever comes to your mind!
